name: ChemConvert
tagline: ChemConvert allows you to calculate common chemical and health equations using non-standard units.
body:
ChemConvert allows you to calculate common chemical and health equations using non-standard units. 

Chemical equations that you can convert:
Moles
Ideal Gas equation
Gibbs Free Energy 
Beer Lambert Law

Health equations that you can convert:
Body Fat - Male
Body Fat - Female
BMI

Version 1.0 includes common units, more exotic units are on the way soon!

Created by Jordan Dialpuri 2020

Having issues? Contact: dialpuri@icloud.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
